com.gleaserver.aps
Class ClientCommandService

java.lang.Object
  com.gleaserver.aps.ClientCommandService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientCommandService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Client Command Service

Version:
1.0 Intended to be run as an embedded thread, this class interprets and executes new commands seen across the network.
Author:
aGleason
